title: 377: Someone’s Man is Sus & Someone Needs to Make a Move!
itunes:title: 377: Someone’s Man is Sus & Someone Needs to Make a Move!
description:
Hookups! Breakups! And declarations of love! The #broadsquad sent in some relationship audio questions - and the drama gets spicy! It’s a must listen!

 

And to the broads who sent in the questions (THANK YOU) and please send updates to askthebroads@gmail.com - we are on the edge of our seats!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***SURELY WINES: Visit HISURELY.COM/CHATTY and use code CHATTY to receive 20% off all Surely products!

***HELLO FRESH: Go to HELLOFRESH.COM and use code CHATTY16 for up to 16 free meals and 3 free gifts!

***THRIVE MARKET: Join today to get 40% off your first order AND a free gift worth over $50 at THRIVEMARKET.COM/CHATTY

***PRETTY LITTER: Go to PRETTYLITTER.COM/CHATTY to save 20% on your first order!

***WONDERY’S CALL ME CURIOUS: Listen to Call Me Curious on Apple Podcasts, Amazon Music, or wherever you listen. Listen early and ad-free by subscribing to Wondery Plus in Apple Podcasts or the Wondery app!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
